title: Author Correction: Matrix-producing neutrophils populate and shield the skin
author: Tommaso Vicanolo
excerpt: Nature - Author Correction: Matrix-producing neutrophils populate and shield the skin
text: Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-025-08741-5 Published online 19 March 2025In the version of the article initially published, in the “Mice” paragraph of the Methods, the text “The mouse sequence for the CNA35-mCherry cassette was obtained from Dr. Rinkevich at Helmholtz Zentrum Munchen” was missing and has now been added. Similarly, the text “Dr. Mück-Häusl and Dr. Rinkevich at Helmholtz Zentrum München for help designing the CNA35-reporter mice” was missing from the Acknowledgements section and has now been added. These corrections have been made to the HTML and PDF versions of the article. html:
Correction to: Nature https://doi.org/10.1038/s41586-025-08741-5 Published online 19 March 2025

In the version of the article initially published, in the “Mice” paragraph of the Methods, the text “The mouse sequence for the CNA35-mCherry cassette was obtained from Dr. Rinkevich at Helmholtz Zentrum Munchen” was missing and has now been added. Similarly, the text “Dr. Mück-Häusl and Dr. Rinkevich at Helmholtz Zentrum München for help designing the CNA35-reporter mice” was missing from the Acknowledgements section and has now been added. These corrections have been made to the HTML and PDF versions of the article.
